chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

remove_zero_den: list (nat * nat) -> list (nat * nat)
remove_zero_den_Forall: forall l, fractran_regular (remove_zero_den l)
l: list (nat * nat)
y: nat
n: nat

Goal:
fractran_regular l -> fractran_steps l n 0 y -> y = 0

Premises:

fractran_terminates = fun l (x : nat) => exists y : nat, fractran_compute l x y /\ fractran_stop l y : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments fractran_terminates _%list_scope _%nat_scope
fractran_step_inv : forall (P : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), P /F/ x → y -> exists l (p q : nat) (r : list (nat * nat)), P = l ++ (p, q) :: r /\ (forall u v : nat, In (u, v) l -> ~ divides v (u * x)) /\ q * y = p * x
fractran_step_sind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> SProp, (forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> (forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> P l x y -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> forall l (n n0 : nat), l /F/ n → n0 -> P l n n0
fractran_step_ind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> (forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> P l x y -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> forall l (n n0 : nat), l /F/ n → n0 -> P l n n0
Inductive fractran_step : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop := in_fractran_0 : forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y | in_fractran_1 : forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y Arguments fractran_step _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_fractran_0 (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_fractran_1 (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
fractran_stop = fun l (x : nat) => forall z : nat, ~ l /F/ x → z : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments fractran_stop _%list_scope _%nat_scope
fractran_rt_head_not_zero : forall (p q : nat) l (n y : nat), q <> 0 -> fractran_steps ((p, q) :: l) n 0 y -> y = 0
fractran_step_bound : forall l, fractran_regular l -> {k : nat | forall x y : nat, l /F/ x → y -> y <= k * x}
FRACTRAN_REG_PROBLEM = {l : list (nat * nat) & {_ : nat | fractran_regular l}} : Set
fractran_step_no_zero_den : forall l (x y : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y -> x = 0 -> y = 0
fractran_step_head_not_zero : forall (p q : nat) l (y : nat), q <> 0 -> (p, q) :: l /F/ 0 → y -> y = 0
in_fractran_0 : forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y
mul_pos_inj_l : forall q x y : nat, q <> 0 -> q * x = q * y -> x = y
fractran_zero_num_step : forall l, Exists (fun c : nat * nat => fst c = 0) l -> forall x : nat, exists y : nat, l /F/ x → y
prime.expand = fix expand (p : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => x + p * expand p l0 end : nat -> list nat -> nat Arguments prime.expand _%nat_scope _%list_scope
fractran_step_fun : forall l (x y1 y2 : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y1 -> l /F/ x → y2 -> y1 = y2
fractran_step_cons_inv : forall (p q : nat) l (x y : nat), (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y < -> q * y = p * x \/ ~ divides q (p * x) /\ l /F/ x → y
FRACTRAN_HALTING_on_zero_first_no_zero_den : forall (p q : nat) l, q <> 0 -> FRACTRAN_HALTING ((p, q) :: l, 0) < -> False
Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C)
Ring_polynom.MPcond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C) -> list R -> Prop
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
mult_is_O : forall n m : nat, n * m = 0 -> n = 0 \/ m = 0
natr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N * Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) eq BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l pe2

```  
intros H1 H2. 
intros H3 H4. 
unfold fractran_regular in H1.
unfold fractran_steps in H2.
unfold fractran_regular. 
intros H5 H6. 
apply (fractran_rt_head_not_zero 0 y) in H2.
apply (fractran_step_head_not_zero n n0 0) in H3.
rewrite H2 in H3.
exact H3.
exact H6.
exact H4.
exact H1. 
```

original: intros H1 H2. intros H3 H4. unfold fractran_regular in H1. unfold fractran_steps in H2. unfold fractran_regular. intros H5 H6. apply (fractran_rt_head_not_zero 0 y) in H2. apply (fractran_step_head_not_zero n n0 0) in H3. rewrite H2 in H3. apply H3. apply H6. apply H4. apply H1.
